ComicInfo.Summary:
As Goliath is shackled and taken away by the gargoyle task force Matt Bluestone steps out of the shadows to stop Hudson from trying to save him.
Back at the Eyri building, Coldfire agrees to perform Angela and Broadway's commitment ceremony before Hudson returns and told the clan about Goliath being captured.
At Rikers Island, Goliath wakes up shaled and with a shock collar in a cell across from Dracon and Brod.
while the Gargoyles are sleeping during the day a lawyer named Toby Crest puts forward a motion demanding to know what Goliath is accused of beyond simply existing, claiming he has rights. Margot Yale calls this preposterous, arguing that since a gargoyle isn't human it doesn't have human rights (which is actually a fair point).
Back at the Eyrei building Brooklyn decides he, Coldfire, and Colstone will rescue Goliath. they break in but Goliath tells them to leave him there.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-20 18:01:26. [Issue ID 985742]
